scripts.updatelib: cd electron && yarn remove cloudriglib && yarn add file:../../lib
scripts.postinstall: cd react && rm -rf node_modules && yarn install && cd ../electron && rm -rf node_modules && yarn install
scripts.dev: yarn run concurrently "cd react && yarn start" "yarn updatelib && cd electron && yarn run electron ."
scripts.pre-build: rm -rf .tmp && yarn run concurrently "cd ./electron && rm -rf ./node_modules && yarn install --only=production && cd .. && cp -r ./electron ./.tmp && cd ./.tmp && rm dev.html && rm yarn.lock && rm -f yarn-error.log" "cd ./react && rm -rf ./node_modules && yarn install --only=production && yarn build && cd .. && cp -r react/build .tmp && cd .tmp && mv -f index.prod.js index.js"
scripts.build: yarn pre-build && cd .tmp && npx electron-builder && cd .. && rm -rf .tmp
scripts.deploygithub: export $(cat .env | xargs) && npm run pre-build && cd .tmp && npx electron-builder -p onTagOrDraft && cd .. && rm -rf .tmp
